name: Xylophone Music Memory Game
description:
Features:
19 keys (1.5 Octaves)
High quality real xylophone sounds

Free Play Mode:
Create your favorite tunes with the multi-touch / multi- slide xylophone keyboard.

Game Mode:
Watch the notes play on the xylophone in sequence and repeat the same notes in the same order. Challenge your memory skill with the xylophone memory game and have fun.

For more information on music theory learning, please visit us at http://piano-music-theory.com
